posts.post_title: FS: SGC 20 T207 Joe Wood -Price Lowered $500 shipped
posts.post_content:
T207 Joe Wood (TOUGH!) SGC 20, only Wood/Napoleon on the SGC registry. Price - $500 shipped. Email if interested! Has "Wood" written in pencil on his pants leg, which probably accounts for the grade. No Creases or or paper loss. (sorry about the bad scan!)

$575 obo Shipped, need to get downpayment for a car!
